fields.title: Podofo Android Car Stereo with GPS Bluetooth 10 inch Touchscreen Double Din Radio with Backup Camera Support Android/iOS Phone Mirror Link WiFi FM Dual USB
fields.description:
Features:
1:10 inch 2.5D Tempered Glass Mirror with HD digital touch screen
2.Built-in GPS receiver, built-in WIFI module
3.Include a rear view camera
4.Steering wheel control: Through it you can control the functions you need by steering wheel, more convenient
5.Built-in Bluetooth 4.0, support Bluetooth hands-free calls, Bluetooth music play, auto loading phonebooks
6.Full electronic digital radio search, high-performance digital tuning FM radio automatic scanning, 18 radio storage
7.Double USB adapter input, car logo setting
8.Driving recorder: You can choose a recorder, and the car has playback, the evidence can be retained
9.Support file manager: Support download, install and delete over thousands of android apps

Specifics:
Screen size:10 Inch
System:Android 10.1
Memory:1GB (RAM)+16GB (ROM)
Screen resolution:1024*600
Mirror link:Android/IOS
Power output:4*45W
Bluetooth version:4.0
Power amplifier chip:AC7388
Radio Band:FM (87.5-108MHz)
Video output:Support
Audio format:APE/FLAC/WAV/MP3/WMA etc
Video format:MKV/RMVB/AVI/MP4/MDV etc
Picture format:PNG/JPEG/JPG/GIF/WBMP/BNP etc
Factory setting keyword:8888

Product included:
1 x Android Car Stereo
1 x Backup Camera
1 x GPS Antenna
1 x Power Harness
2 x USB Adapter
1 x RCA Input and Output Wire
1 x Cam-in Wire
2 x Installation Bracket
fields.bullets: 10” Android Car Stereo: Headunit with 10 inch Full capacitance touch screen and 1080P high definition, based on the latest Android operating system, 1GB + 16GB, which allows you to use and download many app like Google Maps, YouTube, Spotify. Support online/offline GPS Navigation, 18 preset FM stations, bluetooth hands-free calls and rearview camera input, support car logo setting and custom wallpaper.Car Multimedia Player: Support Bluetooth / WiFi / Mirror Link / Steering Wheel Control (SWC). Connect to your phone via Bluetooth for hands-free answering and making calls, playing music and saving contacts and MP3 playback records intelligently.Upgraded Dual system mirror link, IOS one-way :IOS supports mobile phone one-way projection to the machine via wifi. Android two-way:Android supports mobile phone two-way connection via USB/wifi.WIFI /GPS Navigation: Built-in GPS navigation offline data, application named “iGO”. Online maps can be used after wifi connecting,such as Google Map,IGO, Sygic, Waze ect, make your driving more enjoyable and convenient.Rear view Camera Input: Come with a 12 LEDs night vision backup camera, IP67 waterproof and 170° ultra-wide viewing angle, camera will be activate automatically when the car is in the reverse gear, thereby bringing great convenience to the driver.Installation & Best Service: The front panel size: 250(W)*145(H)mm, Two metal brackets can be fixed on the back, installation size: 180(W)*75(H)mm, please make sure your dashboard has enough space to put 10” monitor. Podofo has professional technical team and great customer service, We offer 30-day Money-Back, 12-month Replacement, life-time Technical Support, please contact us if you have any questions, we will reply within 18 hours.
